annotations.description: Template for building a full demo application (frontend + api + database) using Jenkins CI/CD pipeline build strategy integrated with openshift PaaS

message: Your demo stack started a build pipeline in your project. You can use openshift console to observe deployment.

annotations.description: MariaDB base image relying on ${BASE_IMAGE_TAG} and based on startx/mariadb docker image
NodeJS base image relying on ${BASE_IMAGE_TAG} and based on startx/nodejs docker image
MariaDB database for the SXAPI Demo
MariaDB database for the SXAPI Demo
MariaDB database for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS Web frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS Web frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS Web frontend for the SXAPI Demo

parameters.name: BASE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: Base image flavour to use for buidling this application (latest, fc27, fc28, centos6, centos7)

parameters.name: DEMO_API
parameters.description: Domain name suffix for the API endpoint to use in this frontend (ex: xxxxx.apps.startx.fr were xxxxx is your project namespace)

parameters.name: WEBHOOK_TOKEN
parameters.description: Secret token to use in github, gitlab or other to hook build action when code change

parameters.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
parameters.description: The mysql root password to use. Generated if not provided

parameters.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Database password of the application user

parameters.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
parameters.description: name of the default database to create
